text: James Albert Smith Leach (October 15, 1942 - December 11, 2024) was an American academic and politician. He was born in Davenport, Iowa. He was the ninth Chair of the National Endowment for the Humanities from 2009 to 2013.Pogrebin, Robin, "Rocco Landesman Confirmed as Chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts", New York Times, August 7, 2009. He was a member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Iowa from 1977 to 2007 as a Republican. Leach died on December 11, 2024 at a hospital in Iowa City, Iowa from a heart attack caused by a stroke at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * June 21, 2007 speech by Leach on US foreign policy to the Iowa City Foreign Relations Council, MP3 Category:1942 births Category:2024 deaths Category:United States representatives from Iowa Category:People from Davenport, Iowa Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Chairpersons of the National Endowment for the Humanities Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Jim Leach
